Rulings.Tengu:
●This card targets 1 Tuner monster in your GY.
●“Revival Gift” only negates the Tuner monster’s effects that activate on the field. If you Special Summon “Sinister Sprocket” and use it as a Synchro Material Monster, its effect will activate in the GY.
●The Tuner monster and 2 “Gift Fiend Tokens” are considered to be Special Summoned at the same time.
●You cannot activate this card if your opponent has 1 or fewer empty Monster Card Zones.
●If the targeted Tuner monster is no longer in your GY when “Revival Gift” resolves, you still Special Summon 2 “Gift Fiend Tokens” to your opponent’s side of the field.

Rulings.Base:
1. This card targets 1 Tuner monster in your GY.
2. "Revival Gift" only negates the Tuner monster's effects that activate on the field. If you Special Summon "Sinister Sprocket" and use it as a Synchro Material Monster, its effect will activate in the GY.
3. The Tuner monster and 2 "Gift Fiend Tokens" are considered to be Special Summoned at the same time.
4. You cannot activate this card if your opponent has 1 or fewer empty Monster Card Zones.
5. If the targeted Tuner monster is no longer in your GY when "Revival Gift" resolves, you still Special Summon 2 "Gift Fiend Tokens" to your opponent's side of the field.
